title: August 22, 2010
content:
Pioneer trends strategist Gerald Celente founded The Trends Research Institute in 1980. <!--more--> He’s also the author of Trends 2000 and publishes the quarterly Trends Journal, providing timely, comprehensive, accurate business, economic, political, social, technology, and other forecasts on “over 300 different trend categories.
” His latest world views will be discussed.
John Pilger is an award-winning journalist and documentary filmmaker.
His achievements include years as a foreign and war correspondent, author of 10 books, and other frequent writings.
He’s also a longtime critic of Western imperialism and believes a “journalist’s job, first of all, (is) to look in the mirror of his own society” and report on it accurately.
Major world issues will be discussed.
